title: Special Variables in Shell Scripting
description: In this lab, you will learn about the special variables in shell scripting. These variables provide important information about the script execution environment, such as command-line arguments, script name, and process ID.

meta.title: Shell Scripting | Special Variables | Execution Environment
meta.description: Learn about the special variables in shell scripting, including command-line arguments, script name, and process ID. Optimize your scripts with this valuable information.
meta.keywords: shell scripting, special variables, command-line arguments, script name, process ID, execution environment
